title: Game Crashing when connecting to a game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When connecting to a game on NA servers when loading into the game, my game crashes. I've noticed this mostly happens when I have my PBE client open and in que while also joining a game on live NA server, after champ select when loading in, my game crashes. I've send in the crash reports and will attach a photo.


Also, even trying restarting the client, and running the client as an administrator this does not seem to fix the crash. 
Any help will be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Hmmm that might have something to do with both of the clients being open at the same time if I read that right. Try running the game with only one of the clients running at the same time and let's see how that works.

I am trying to repair my client now.

Seemed to fixed it however worried about it happening in the future.
